mapper.update: update pb_banner set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hyperlink_url = #{hyperlinkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, name, img_url, hyperlink_url, remark from pb_banner
